001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
004
005/**
006 * Port that persists reconstructed protocol message pairs to durable storage or downstream systems.
007 *
008 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
009 */
010public interface PersistencePort extends AutoCloseable {
011  /**
012   * Persists a single message pair.
013   *
014   * @param pair reconstructed request/response pair
015   * @throws Exception if the operation fails
016   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017   */
018  void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception;
019
020  /**
021   * Flushes buffered state to the underlying store.
022   *
023   * @throws Exception if flushing fails
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  default void flush() throws Exception {}
027
028  /**
029   * Closes the persistence resource.
030   *
031   * @throws Exception if shutdown fails
032   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
033   */
034  @Override
035  default void close() throws Exception {}
036}
